```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(exploratory)
```

```{r}
nbrx_df = read_excel("data/data.xlsx") %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("4"),
    names_to = "date",
    values_to = "nbrx"
  ) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(hcp_id, date, nbrx, everything())

as.Date(43282, origin = "1899-12-30") #"2018-07-01"
```
